definitions: having or relating to a single pole or kind of polarity
shortDefinitions: having or relating to single pole or kind of polarity

definitions: (of psychiatric illness) characterized by either depressive or (more rarely) manic episodes but not both.
shortDefinitions: (of psychiatric illness) characterized by either depressive or more rarely manic episodes but not both

definitions: (of a nerve cell) having only one axon or process.
shortDefinitions: (of nerve cell) having only one axon or process

definitions: (of a transistor or other device) using charge carriers of a single polarity.
shortDefinitions: (of transistor or other device) using charge carriers of single polarity
